recipe.title: Kale and Cannellini Soup
ingredients: 4 cups cooking liquid from Cannellini Beans with Kale
1 cup diced Italian tomatoes in juice
3 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese plus additional (for serving)
instructions: Heat oil in large pot over medium heat. Add carrot and celery; sauté until starting to soften, about 5 minutes. Add cooking liquid, beans, tomatoes with juice, 3 tablespoons cheese, garlic, and Italian seasoning.
Simmer, uncovered, 30 minutes. Puree 2 cups soup in blender. Return puree to pot. Ladle soup into bowls; top with toasts. Drizzle truffle oil over; sprinkle with cheese.
